sights.address: ul. "Professor Boyan Kamenov" 3, 1756 Studentski Kompleks, Sofia, Bulgaria

sights.name: Amphitheater of Serdica
sights.quote: Restored Roman amphitheater on a hotel's ground floor with a display of ancient coins & ceramics.
sights.address: Budapeshta Street 4, 1000 Sofia Center, Sofia, Bulgaria

sights.name: Regional History Museum - Sofia
sights.quote: Historical exhibits spanning ancient to modern times & cultural events in a storied locale.

sights.name: South Park
sights.quote: Urban, dog-friendly park with walking/biking paths & rides for kids, plus fountains & bars/eateries.

sights.name: Boyana Church Museum
sights.quote: Medieval church known for an interior covered in frescos dating from the late 900s.
